At the top of the main function a variable is initialized with the value 0x3f or â€œ?â€. The first input is then saved to another varaible and their values compared. If they are the same a success message is shown. The program starts off by saying that the answer is right in front of our eyes and the â€œwhat have you foundâ€ message is missing a question mark at the end so it could have been solved even without looking at the assembly.
